remarks: The determinant function is multilinear (additive and homogeneous for each row (matrices are given explicitly by their entries).  Corollary 4.9 in [Lang] p. 515.  (Contributed by SO, 16-Jul-2018.)
statement:
mdetero.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdetero.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
mdetero.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
mdetero.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
mdetero.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
mdetero.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mdetero.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. N ) -> X e. K ) $.
mdetero.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. N ) -> Y e. K ) $.
mdetero.z $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> Z e. K ) $.
mdetero.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. K ) $.
mdetero.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. N ) $.
mdetero.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. N ) $.
mdetero.ij $e |- ( ph -> I =/= J ) $.
mdetero $p |- ( ph -> ( D ` ( i e. N , j e. N |-> if ( i = I , ( X .+ ( W .x. Y ) ) , if ( i = J , Y , Z ) ) ) ) = ( D ` ( i e. N , j e. N |-> if ( i = I , X , if ( i = J , Y , Z ) ) ) ) ) $.
